_sText:
fy_powder (beta 1) by Dr. Spud
I made this map as a throwback to my days of making CS maps. It was fun. And I had all these nice snow assets laying around doing nothing, so I figured I might as well stick them in a map. You might point that this map has a rather large file size and is more fps-taxing than other fy maps. But at this point I'm not really concerned about that anymore. I don't think I'm going to be dethroning the fy maps that get played nowadays, so what's the harm in cranking up the graphics. Plus it's a fun little arena, with a touch more interesting-ness than your average fy_iceworld or fy_snow.
Features
  • Dozens of new models and textures
  • Snow and fog that changes direction with the wind.
  • All your regular amenities like overview radar, HDR, etc.
  • 48 spawns
More by Dr. Spud TF2? Try my A/D CTF map: ctf_haarp Check out my bomb/defuse map, de_glacier For another fight yard map, check out fy_highrise_09
